document.full_text: prince william's bride-to-be, kate middleton, is a rarity in this era of living publicly: a celebrity without a reality show, a facebook page, tweets or a memoir in the works.
document.title: fixating on a future royal as elusive as cinderella
lines_and_colors: prince william's bride-to-be, kate middleton, is a rarity in this era of living publicly: a celebrity without a reality show, a facebook page, tweets or a memoir in the works.
